items.name: Liphakoe Contemporary Art Hub
items.short_description: A vibrant new space showcasing modern Basotho artists, offering rotating exhibits, workshops, and a fresh take on local creative expression.

items.name: Maluti Sky Park
items.short_description: Maseru's newest green oasis, featuring meticulously designed walking trails, shaded picnic spots, and a modern children's playground. Perfect for family outings and relaxation.

items.name: Basotho Film & Culture House
items.short_description: An intimate, recently opened cinema and cultural center experience focusing on African films, documentaries, and independent features, alongside thought-provoking cultural events and discussions.

items.name: Qhobosheane Fresh Market & Eatery
items.short_description: A bustling new market space offering a diverse array of fresh local produce, artisanal crafts, and a variety of food stalls serving modern Basotho and international cuisine.

items.name: Liphofung Adventure Zone
items.short_description: Maseru's premier indoor adventure park, recently opened, with thrilling climbing walls, bouncy trampolines, and challenging obstacle courses, catering to all ages and skill levels.

items.name: Sky Bar Maseru
items.short_description: Perched atop a new high-rise, this stylish rooftop bar offers panoramic views of Maseru, signature cocktails, and a sophisticated atmosphere perfect for evening unwinding.

items.name: Lesotho Innovation Centre & Discovery Hub
items.short_description: An interactive space opened to inspire curiosity in science and technology among youth and adults, featuring hands-on exhibits, engaging demonstrations, and educational programs.

items.name: The Mountain Table
items.short_description: A fine dining establishment redefining Basotho cuisine with a modern twist, using locally sourced ingredients in an elegant and recently opened setting.

items.name: Thaba-Bosiu Wellness Retreat
items.short_description: A serene escape offering rejuvenating spa treatments, calming yoga sessions, and guided nature walks, focusing on holistic well-being with breathtaking views of the Thaba-Bosiu plateau.

items.name: The Knowledge Commons
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art public library combined with modern co-working spaces, recently opened to offer extensive resources for study, collaboration, and vibrant community events.
